Name: Adventures Together Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on the Permanent Adventures Together mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on the Permanent Adventures Together mount that can double-jump to travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map and you will automatically fly to the destination by following the navigation. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, such as Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on the Permanent Adventures Together mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.
